text: Avaru (nim'ma munde), navu vidheyaradevu ennuttare. Taruvaya nim'mallinda horatuhodaga avarallina ondu gumpu, nim'modane heliddakke virud'dhavagi ratri samalocanegalannu nadesuttade. Avaru nadesuttiruva samalocanegalannella allahanu dakhalisiduttiddane. Nivu avarannu kadeganisiri mattu allahanalli bharavase idiri. Karyasadhakanagi allahane saku
